entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
